channel.title: Ubersource Character Files
channel.description:
Hey,
Well I downloaded ubersource and I was trying to look at the player file, and I cannot seem to do that. When I go to the characters folder, the files are .dat and I can not open them... If I use notepad they come up as encrypted files, so I cannot see any information about the player. What do I do to open the player's file? Thanks.

item.title: Ubersource Character Files
